synopsis.text: Sophie Bonaparte, a direct descendant of the legendary Napoleon, embarks on a thrilling journey across the globe in search of the three sacred treasures her ancestor once possessed. As the ambitious leader of the Lady Napoleon organization, Sophie's ultimate goal is to achieve world domination. Joined by her versatile butler, aptly named Butler, and the martial arts master Guy, this dynamic trio leaves no stone unturned in their quest for these lost treasures. This action-packed fantasy anime promises adventure, intrigue, and a dash of history, as Sophie and her team navigate the challenges that come their way in their pursuit of power and conquest.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
